summary: This is a simple retexture for HGO Outfit in white color.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][font=Courier New][color=#ff0000][size=5]Attention! (14.02.2015)
[/size][/color][/font][/u][/b]
[font=Georgia][b]I[/b] added a second version of this retexture mod signed traditionally "V2".
The changes that have been used there as you can see in the second outfit image (Logo does not matter :P) also newly added, these are mostly removed details like chain in the hood or a wolf on his right shoulder and band on his left forearm and left thigh. I think they did not fit into the whole white color of this outfit. However, although this is where i leave it like V1 version which is not removed anything from the original.[/font]

[b][font=Courier New]--------------------------------------------------[/font][u][font=Courier New][size=5][color=#efefef]

[/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZnEY2ap.png[/img]
[/size][/font][/u][/b]
[font=Georgia][size=2][b]T[/b]his is a white retexture for Hunting Grounds Outfit mod orginaly created by. [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/572584/?tb=feed&pUp=1][color=#efefef]Nimezis[/color][/url][/b]
I made this [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]natively for my character (I play white female [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]werewolf | M[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]aybe in the future it share it too) and i use it as a private mod. [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]Now release it to a wider group of players Skyrim, maybe [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]someone will like it. :)[/size]
[/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmK2UIL.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=2][b]#1.[/b] [b][u]Original version Hunting Grounds Outfit is required![/u][/b] You can find it here -> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/?][color=#ff0000][b]Click[/b][/color][/url]
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2][b]
#2.[/b] Install the original version! Then folder "textures" (And "meshes" in case V2 version) included in the archive on this page put to your "data" folder in Skyrim directory
[b]
#3. [/b]Overwrite the original files
[b]
#4. [/b][/size][/font][size=2][font=Georgia]That's all, have fun! :)[/font]
[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rAcl67c.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][b]T[/b]hank you very much for this place[b] [/b][/font][font=Georgia][b]Nimezis[/b] for create this great outfit mod and permission to share this retexture and traditionally [b]Bethesda[/b] for create a great game which is the Skyrim.[/font]
author: xGruby91x
